title: BugSplat Please Help!!!!!!
body: Hi i keep getting bugsplat errors and im just wondering if im going to get banned because i cant join my games?

replies.body: Bugspalts are usually caused by outdated draivers or bad game files that can't load the game properly.  While you won't really get banned unless the leaves are intentional, you can receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty which places you in a lower priority queue.  I recommend going over the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up, but test it out in custom games for now.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thanks i got it fixed i went into setting and did the full repair thing thanks for responding!
